attributes.action: Explain to the electorate why the non-legitimate expense claims are not being treated as fraud.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs expense claims are a necessity, however, a lot of these claims are for items and services that are not authorised for claiming on expense (therefore by definition, Fraud).

We request that the Prime Minister explain why, as these claims are clearly fraudulent, why the Police are not involved in a fraud investigation into the MPs who have made them.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
